name: Racing Tycoon - Idle Game
description:
Welcome to the most exciting Racing Cars Idle Game! Are you ready to manage your own tycoon car race and become the richest person alive?

- Unlock lots of cars!!!
- Travel the world with more racing tracks!
- Upgrade your cars and racing tracks!
- Earn millions and billions while you're offline!
- Tap on cars to increase their speed!
developers: NeverEnding Media S. de R.L., C.V.
publishers: Never Ending Media, S. de R.L., C.V
